languages.text: {n}Внезапный рейд друкари оказался отличным прикрытием — выродки и подумать не могли, что эта атака направляется Вольным Торговцем, раскрывш{mf|им|ей} их мерзкий заговор. Это давало слугам Лорд-капитана драгоценное время.{/n}

{n}The surprise raid of the Drukhari proved to be an excellent distraction — the heretics could not have guessed that this attack was being directed at the behest of the Rogue Trader, who had uncovered their despicable conspiracy. This attack granted the Lord Captain's servants some precious time.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапный рейд друкари оказался отличным прикрытием — выродки и подумать не могли, что эта атака направляется Вольным Торговцем, раскрывш{mf|им|ей} их мерзкий заговор. Это давало слугам Лорд-капитана драгоценное время.{/n}

This attack granted the Lord Captain's servants some precious time.{/n}

languages.text: {n}事实证明，黑暗灵族的突然袭击充分吸引了那些异端分子的注意力，他们根本猜不到这场袭击是在行商浪人的授意下进行的，全然不知道他们的邪恶阴谋已经暴露。这次进攻为行商浪人的仆人争取到了宝贵的时间。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The surprise raid of the Drukhari proved to be an excellent distraction — the heretics could not have guessed that this attack was being directed at the behest of the Rogue Trader, who had uncovered their despicable conspiracy. This attack granted the Lord Captain's servants some precious time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}事实证明，黑暗灵族的突然袭击充分吸引了那些异端分子的注意力，他们根本猜不到这场袭击是在行商浪人的授意下进行的，全然不知道他们的邪恶阴谋已经暴露。这次进攻为行商浪人的仆人争取到了宝贵的时间。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La incursión sorpresa de los Drukhari resultó ser una excelente distracción. Los herejes no podían haber adivinado que este ataque estaba siendo dirigido por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, que había descubierto su despreciable conspiración. Este ataque concedió a los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán un tiempo precioso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The surprise raid of the Drukhari proved to be an excellent distraction — the heretics could not have guessed that this attack was being directed at the behest of the Rogue Trader, who had uncovered their despicable conspiracy. This attack granted the Lord Captain's servants some precious time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La incursión sorpresa de los Drukhari resultó ser una excelente distracción. Los herejes no podían haber adivinado que este ataque estaba siendo dirigido por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, que había descubierto su despreciable conspiración. Este ataque concedió a los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán un tiempo precioso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの奇襲は、見事に敵の気をそらした...異端者たちは、この攻撃が自分たちの卑劣な陰謀を暴いたローグトレーダーの命令によって実行されたとは思いもしなかった。この攻撃により、ロード・キャプテンの従者たちに貴重な時間的猶予が与えられた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The surprise raid of the Drukhari proved to be an excellent distraction — the heretics could not have guessed that this attack was being directed at the behest of the Rogue Trader, who had uncovered their despicable conspiracy. This attack granted the Lord Captain's servants some precious time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの奇襲は、見事に敵の気をそらした...異端者たちは、この攻撃が自分たちの卑劣な陰謀を暴いたローグトレーダーの命令によって実行されたとは思いもしなかった。この攻撃により、ロード・キャプテンの従者たちに貴重な時間的猶予が与えられた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'attaque-surprise des Drukharis fait une excellente diversion : les hérétiques ne devinent jamais qu'elle a été organisée à la demande {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} qui avait eu vent de leur ignoble complot. Elle permet aux serviteurs {mf|du seigneur|de la seigneure}-capitaine de gagner un temps précieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The surprise raid of the Drukhari proved to be an excellent distraction — the heretics could not have guessed that this attack was being directed at the behest of the Rogue Trader, who had uncovered their despicable conspiracy. This attack granted the Lord Captain's servants some precious time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'attaque-surprise des Drukharis fait une excellente diversion : les hérétiques ne devinent jamais qu'elle a été organisée à la demande {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} qui avait eu vent de leur ignoble complot. Elle permet aux serviteurs {mf|du seigneur|de la seigneure}-capitaine de gagner un temps précieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Überraschungsangriff auf die Drukhari erwies sich als hervorragende Ablenkung — die Ketzer ahnten nicht, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihre widerwärtige Verschwörung aufgedeckt und diesen Angriff geplant hatte. Die Operation verschaffte den Dienern des Lord Captains wertvolle Zeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The surprise raid of the Drukhari proved to be an excellent distraction — the heretics could not have guessed that this attack was being directed at the behest of the Rogue Trader, who had uncovered their despicable conspiracy. This attack granted the Lord Captain's servants some precious time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Überraschungsangriff auf die Drukhari erwies sich als hervorragende Ablenkung — die Ketzer ahnten nicht, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihre widerwärtige Verschwörung aufgedeckt und diesen Angriff geplant hatte. Die Operation verschaffte den Dienern des Lord Captains wertvolle Zeit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Beklenmedik Drukhari baskını, harika bir dikkat dağıtma yöntemi olduğunu kanıtlandı. Bu saldırının alçak komplolarını açığa çıkaran Hür Tacir'in emriyle yürütüldüğü, kâfirlerin akıllarının ucundan bile geçmedi. Bu saldırı, Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetkârlarına bir hayli zaman kazandırdı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The surprise raid of the Drukhari proved to be an excellent distraction — the heretics could not have guessed that this attack was being directed at the behest of the Rogue Trader, who had uncovered their despicable conspiracy. This attack granted the Lord Captain's servants some precious time.{/n}
